questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant shape of the product container?
What is the primary color of the bottle, excluding any graphics?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the product's packaging?
Observing the cap's structure, what would you describe its design as?

What type of graphic design element is prominently displayed on the label?

Considering the graphics, what is the overall aesthetic style of the label?
Regarding the print on the bottle, is the text predominantly large or small?
Describe the position of the main label relative to the bottle.
Are there any noticeable tactile elements besides the cap on the bottle?

Is the bottle's surface uniformly colored or are there variations?
Excluding the cap, are there any other visible closures or openings?
What is the primary purpose indicated by the visual cues of the product?
